2+1.sig_info: Quake Blocks an additional 7.5 to 30.07% Damage and Redirects it back to the opponent as a pulse of Physical Damage.

WHEN CHARGING A HEAVY ATTACK: Quake generates powerful waves of vibrations that cause an Earthquake, dealing 11 Physical Damage per second.
Inflicts Concussion, reducing the opponent’s Ability Accuracy by 100%.
While Quake is generating an Earthquake through this attack, the Aftershock Scale goes up by 1 every 0.48 seconds.
AFTERSHOCK: An Aftershock hits 10 seconds after an Earthquake. For every point in the Scale, Aftershock deals 31.02 Physical Damage.
10% chance to Stun the opponent for 1.50 seconds. This effect cannot interrupt Special Attacks.
Aftershock Stun Duration and Accuracy goes up by 10% for every point in the Aftershock Scale.
Inflicts Concussion, reducing the opponent’s Ability Accuracy by 100% for 5 seconds when the Aftershock Scale is higher than 4 points.
PASSIVE: Evades all Basic Attacks against opponents with a Concussion.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Adds 2 points to the Aftershock Scale.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Adds 3 points to the Aftershock Scale.
100% chance to inflict Concussion, reducing the opponent’s Ability Accuracy by 100% for 5 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Adds 6 points to the Aftershock Scale.
100% chance to Stun for 3 second(s).
